page.title: 13A DAY IN THE LIFE OF REBECCA
page.content: I get up between 7 and 7,30. I Wash and get dressed then I take the dog out. Usually I take him around the fields, where I let him off the lead for a run. When I return I have breakfast then I get in the car to come to school. When mum is working I come to school in the car but when she isn't I come in the coach. We live in Chedzoy and mum is a supply teacher at Haygrove Comprehensive School. On Thursday we do not have an assembly but we have swimming and art. At lunch I play with my friends. For my dinner I have sandwiches. When I get home from school I feed my rabbits, cats, gerbils, guinea pigs and tadpoles then after taking the dog out I go to gym. We do bars, beams, floor and vaults. I get home starving. After supper I practice the violin and piano, feed the dog then go to bed
